3. Deficiency in the antidiuretic hormone arginine vasopressin (AVP) - This is a specific deficiency or condition that leads to the disease.
4. Arginine vasopressin (AVP) - This is a hormone that is deficient in the disease.
5. AVP - neurophysin II (AVP - NPII) gene - This is the specific gene that is responsible for encoding the AVP hormone and is located on chromosome 20p13.
6. Chromosome 20p13 - This is the specific location of the AVP - NPII gene on a chromosome.
